body_html: I confirm what andyatgh has said. The 3.6 GPU version at this link http://www.lfd.uci.edu/~gohlke/pythonlibs/#tensorflow isn't compiled correctly but CPU version seems working like the official Tensorflow release. However Tensorflow staff need to support Python 3.6 and Windows out of the box without force the users to manual compilations and workaround.
